scenarios.title: Giving constructive feedback
scenarios.response: Deliver feedback early, frequently, and with specific examples.
scenarios.question: I want to engage in a roleplay on giving constructive feedback

scenarios.title: Effective 1:1 meetings
scenarios.response: You should schedule fixed time and have a document where you capture notes.
scenarios.question: How can I have effective 1:1s?

fallbackResponse: This is a demo of how the AI Coach will function. I will respond to your question in a few weeks ðŸ˜Š
sampleInputs: What's the best way to give feedback to my team?
How should I handle a conversation about someone's career path?
How do I set meaningful goals for my team?
How do I keep my team motivated during tough times?
There is some conflict between two team members. What should I do?
How do I build trust with my new team?
What's a good approach to delegation?
How can I make meetings more productive?
How do I review someone's performance fairly?
How do I improve communication flow?
What's a good way to manage time better?
